game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Save the princess from the evil dragon.
game.description: The princess has been captured by the evil dragon Smaug. You must travel to his lair and rescue her before it's too late.
game.reward: The princess's hand in marriage and half of the kingdom.

task.description: The dragon's lair is located in the Dark Forest.
The dragon is a powerful creature, so be prepared for a tough fight.
Once you have defeated the dragon, rescue the princess and return her to the castle.
